Trade/Device Name(s): Gmate Mini Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Gmate Step Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Gmate Mini Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Gmate Step Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Gmate Mini and Gmate Step blood glucose monitoring systems for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood using electrochemical detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for self-testing by individuals with diabetes for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from various sites, not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
